title.rendered: Eldorado Stone Brings the Heat with New Limestone Finish Sample Boxes

content.rendered:
San Diego, CA – Eldorado Stone, the leading manufacturer of architectural stone veneer, is now offering new sample boxes for its collection of Artisan Fire Bowls and Fireplace Surrounds. The sample kits provide handcrafted limestone finishes and four color options of the bowls and surrounds, making it convenient for industry professionals to view design options directly in their home. Samples include variations of Honed, a smooth surface, and Travertine, a more textured surface, with color options for every style preference. For only $30 and with free shipping to any location, architects, interior designers and other specifiers can now add these kits to their sample libraries for future projects.

“We are thrilled to provide consumers and trade professionals with a convenient way to view color and texture options directly in their home,” said Sarah Lograsso, Marketing Director at Eldorado Stone. “With a variety of style preferences and design inspirations, fireplace surrounds and fire bowls add a warm ambiance to any home, transforming ordinary spaces into meaningful environments.”

Tweet This: New sample boxes from @eldoradostone include fireplace surround and artisan fire bowl color and texture options, allowing professionals to view design options directly in their home. #firebowls #fireplace http://bit.ly/ESFireBowlSamples

Eldorado Stone fire bowls come in nine unique, handcrafted shapes and variations. Each bowl comes with a 65,000 BTU burner that uses half the fuel of conventional fire rings, while producing higher flames and a brighter glow. All fire bowls can be customized with hardwood tops, and bowls that are fueled by liquid propane can be accessorized with side tables to house the fuel tank.

Eldorado Stone fireplace surrounds are handcrafted to create a distinctive appearance. Eldorado Stone offers 10 styles ranging from contemporary to traditional, giving any space a unique sense of design and mesmerizing power that fit the character of the home.
